sources.title: Wise Girls (MGM, 1929) ROLAND YOUNG üçïCLASSIC COMEDY
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Roland Young, Norma Lee, Elliott Nugent
Director: Mason Hopper

Step back into the golden age of early sound cinema with this rare classic comedy, adapted from the Broadway hit Kempy by father-and-son writing team J.C. and Elliott Nugent. Both Nugents reprise their stage roles, joined by Norma Lee, Elliott‚Äôs real-life wife, making this film a true family affair. Also featured is the inimitable Roland Young, whose witty presence and dry delivery add a memorable spark to the ensemble.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

Set in a domestic whirlwind of misunderstandings and sharp dialogue, the film blends family dynamics with the fast-talking charm typical of pre-Code Hollywood. Though less known today, its historical value and theatrical roots make it a fascinating artifact of early MGM sound productions.
